select * from (select dense_rank() over(order by p.profit_at desc, p.member_id, c.name) as rn, p.profit_at, sum(p.mileage) as mileage, c.name, LISTAGG(m.title, ', ') within group(order by m.title) as title from profit_history p, common_code c, music m where p.place = c.id and p.pks = m.id and p.member_id = #{memberId} and p.place = 'U01'
and p.profit_at BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and p.profit_at BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
group by p.profit_at, p.member_id, c.name order by p.profit_at desc ) where rn> (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} and rn <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
